SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EX00.PROJECT P JOIN DTL_CODE DC3 ON P.COMPYNO = DC3.DTL_CD AND DC3.CODE = 'D600'
AND P.PJTNM LIKE '%' || #{pjtNm} || '%'
AND P.COMPYNO LIKE '%' || #{compyNo} || '%'
AND P.PJTFROMDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{pjtFromDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and TO_DATE(#{pjtToDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND P.PJTFROMDATE > = #{pjtFromDate}
AND P.PJTTODATE < = #{pjtToDate}
AND 1 = 0
SELECT PJTNO , PJTNM , TO_CHAR(PJTFROMDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJTFROMDATE , TO_CHAR(PJTTODATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJTTODATE , COMPYNO FROM EX00.PROJECT WHERE PJTNO = #{pjtNo}

SELECT P.PJTNM , P.pjtNo , DC6.DTL_CDNM AS COMPANYNM , TO_CHAR(P.PJTFROMDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJTFROMDATE , TO_CHAR(P.PJTTODATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJTTODATE , M.UNO , M.UNM , MP.PJTROLE , TO_CHAR(MP.INP_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INPDATE , TO_CHAR(MP.WDP_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WDPDATE FROM PROJECT P LEFT JOIN MEMBER_PROJECT MP ON MP.PJTNO = P.PJTNO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON MP.UNO = M.UNO LEFT JOIN DTL_CODE DC6 ON P.COMPYNO = DC6.DTL_CD AND DC6.CODE ='D600' LEFT JOIN DTL_CODE DC7 ON MP.PJTROLE = DC7.DTL_CD AND DC7.CODE ='D700' WHERE P.PJTNO = #{pjtNo}
